title: REC signs MoU with Rajasthan to finance Rs 3 lakh crore for projects
description: REC Ltd agrees to provide Rs 50,000 crore annually to Rajasthan for power and non-power projects until 2030, totaling Rs 3 lakh crore. The funding boost allows development in sectors like power, metro, roads, airports, IT, oil refinery, and renewable energy, among others.
